name: AmuletOfAgileFists
description: If the wearer has the Weapon Finesse feat, this amulet allows her to apply her Dexterity modifier (in place of her Strength modifier) to damage rolls with all unarmed and natural weapon attacks.

name: AmuletOfAgileFistsPlus1
description: If the wearer has the Weapon Finesse feat, this amulet allows her to apply her Dexterity modifier (in place of her Strength modifier) to damage rolls with all unarmed and natural weapon attacks. It also grants a +1 enhancement bonus on attack and damage rolls with unarmed attacks and natural weapons.

name: AmuletOfAgileFistsPlus2
description: If the wearer has the Weapon Finesse feat, this amulet allows her to apply her Dexterity modifier (in place of her Strength modifier) to damage rolls with all unarmed and natural weapon attacks. It also grants a +2 enhancement bonus on attack and damage rolls with unarmed attacks and natural weapons.

name: AmuletOfAgileFistsPlus3
description: If the wearer has the Weapon Finesse feat, this amulet allows her to apply her Dexterity modifier (in place of her Strength modifier) to damage rolls with all unarmed and natural weapon attacks. It also grants a +3 enhancement bonus on attack and damage rolls with unarmed attacks and natural weapons.

name: AmuletOfAgileFistsPlus4
description: If the wearer has the Weapon Finesse feat, this amulet allows her to apply her Dexterity modifier (in place of her Strength modifier) to damage rolls with all unarmed and natural weapon attacks. It also grants a +4 enhancement bonus on attack and damage rolls with unarmed attacks and natural weapons.

name: AmuletOfApothecaryItem
description: This +1 natural armor amulet grants the wearer +4 morale bonus on saving throws against poison.

name: AmuletOfBlackenedMirrorItem
description: Whenever the wearer of this amulet uses a hex, its DC is increased by 1.

name: AmuletOfDeepWaterItem
description: This amulet grants its wearer a +6 enhancement bonus to Constitution and a +5 deflection bonus to AC.

enchant.name: AmuletOfDeepWaterEnchantment
effect: Add stat bonus 6 to Constitution (descriptor: Enhancement)
Add stat bonus 5 to AC (descriptor: Deflection)

name: AmuletOfEternalHunter
description: This necklace gives its wearer a +2 bonus on attack rolls and +4 bonus on damage rolls against animals and magical beasts.

name: AmuletOfEvilDoomItem
description: This necklace gives its wearer DR 10/Good.

name: AmuletOfFourElementsItem
description: Whenever the wearer of this amulet casts a spell with fire, electricity, cold or acid descriptor, that spell deals +1 point of damage per die rolled.

name: AmuletOfInnerVirtue
description: This amulet grants its wearer the ability to cast Overwhelming Presence as 11th level Wizard once per day. It also increases the wearer's Ki pool by 5.

name: AmuletOfLifeVeilItem
description: This amulet grants its wearer a +6 enhancement bonus to Constitution and the ability to cast cure serious wounds spell as a 5th level cleric twice per day.

enchant.name: Constitution6
effect: Add stat bonus 6 to Constitution (descriptor: Enhancement)

name: AmuletOfMightyFists1
description: This amulet grants its wearer a +1 enhancement bonus on attack and damage rolls with unarmed attacks and natural weapons.

name: AmuletOfMightyFists2
description: This amulet grants its wearer a +2 enhancement bonus on attack and damage rolls with unarmed attacks and natural weapons.

name: AmuletOfMightyFists3
description: This amulet grants its wearer a +3 enhancement bonus on attack and damage rolls with unarmed attacks and natural weapons.

name: AmuletOfMightyFists4
description: This amulet grants its wearer a +4 enhancement bonus on attack and damage rolls with unarmed attacks and natural weapons.

name: AmuletOfMightyFists5
description: This amulet grants its wearer a +5 enhancement bonus on attack and damage rolls with unarmed attacks and natural weapons.

name: AmuletOfNaturalArmor1
description: This amulet grants its wearer a +1 natural armor enhancement bonus to Armor Class. This bonus does not stack with other natural armor enhancement bonuses.

name: AmuletOfNaturalArmor2
description: This amulet grants its wearer a +2 natural armor enhancement bonus to Armor Class. This bonus does not stack with other natural armor enhancement bonuses.

name: AmuletOfNaturalArmor3
description: This amulet grants its wearer a +3 natural armor enhancement bonus to Armor Class. This bonus does not stack with other natural armor enhancement bonuses.

name: AmuletOfNaturalArmor4
description: This amulet grants its wearer a +4 natural armor enhancement bonus to Armor Class. This bonus does not stack with other natural armor enhancement bonuses.

name: AmuletOfNaturalArmor5
description: This amulet grants its wearer a +5 natural armor enhancement bonus to Armor Class. This bonus does not stack with other natural armor enhancement bonuses.

name: AmuletOfQuickDrawItem
description: This amulet grants its a wearer a +2 insight bonus on attack and damage rolls with ranged weapons against Large and bigger enemies. It also grants a +4 bonus on Initiative rolls.

enchant.name: AmuletOfQuickDrawEnchantment
effect: Add stat bonus 4 to Initiative (descriptor: UntypedStackable)

name: AmuletOfSpells
description: This amulet adds +4 to the wearer's caster level when they cast the following spells

name: AmuletOfTheDyingWisdom
description: The wearer feels all the weight of the old age. He gains -3 profane penalty to Strength, Dexterity and Consitution, but +2 profane bonus to Intelligence, Wisdom and Charisma.

enchant.name: AmuletOfTheDyingWisdomEnchantment
effect: Add stat bonus -3 to Strength (descriptor: Profane)
Add stat bonus -3 to Dexterity (descriptor: Profane)
Add stat bonus -3 to Constitution (descriptor: Profane)
Add stat bonus 2 to Intelligence (descriptor: Profane)
Add stat bonus 2 to Wisdom (descriptor: Profane)
Add stat bonus 2 to Charisma (descriptor: Profane)

name: AmuletOfTimeTrickery
description: This amulet allows its wearer to cast haste spell as a 5th level wizard once per day.

name: AmuletOfUnforgivingElementsItem
description: Whenever the wearer of this amulet deals elemental (fire, cold, electricity or acid) damage through a spell to an enemy for the first time, the enemy must pass a Fortitude saving throw (DC 24) or suffer 2d6 damage of corresponding element type each time it fails a saving throw for 3 rounds.

name: AmuletofInitiative
description: This amulet grants a +4 morale bonus to the wearer's Initiative checks.

enchant.name: AmuletofInitiativeEnchantment
effect: Add stat bonus 4 to Initiative (descriptor: Morale)

name: AmuletofPersuasion
description: This amulet grants its wearer a +5 morale bonus to all Persuasion skill checks.

enchant.name: AmuletofPersuasionEnchant
effect: Add stat bonus 5 to SkillPersuasion (descriptor: Morale)

name: AspectOfTheAspItem
description: This amulet in a form of a snake grants the wearer +2 DC on poison spells, all ray spells deal additional 1d6 + 1 per 2 caster levels points of acid damage.

name: BackrankAssistanceItem
description: If the wearer of this amulet is wielding a ranged weapon, whenever an ally in a 30 feet radius lands an attack of opportunity, the wearer makes a free ranged attack against the same target. This effect can only occur once per target.

name: BeholderOfWindAmuletItem
description: This locket grants its wearer a +4 enhancement bonus to Dexterity and allows to cast blessings of luck and resolve spell twice per day as a 3rd level cleric.

enchant.name: Dexterity4
effect: Add stat bonus 4 to Dexterity (descriptor: Enhancement)

name: BindingsOfThePrinceItem
description: 3 times per day the wearer may throw this amulet at an enemy. If the target fails a DC 24 Reflex saving throw, it becomes ensnared by the chain. The ensnared creature takes a -4 penalty to Dexterity, a -2 penalty to both AC and attack, and takes 1d6+5 bludgeoning damage each round. Additionally, each time the wearer takes damage, the chain inflicts 1/2 as much damage on the ensnared creature.

name: CameliaAmuletItem
description: Mystical amulet in the shape of a snake made from bone. The pendant is a snake skull.

name: ClockworkPendant
description: This pendant grants its wearer a +10 bonus to movement speed. Slow and haste spells cast by the wearer have their duration increased by a half as if affected by an Extend Spell feat.

name: DeathlyArousalItem
description: This choker protects the wearer from losing their head, and not only in bed. Once per day whenever the enemy, deals the wearer a killing blow, the choker restores them 50 HP and knocks the attacker prone for 2 rounds.

name: GiantslayersClasp
description: This necklace gives its wearer an inherent +2 dodge bonus to AC against the attacks of monsters with Giant subtype.

name: GlassAmuletOfClarityItem
description: This amulet adds +2 to the DC for all saving throws against mind-affecting abilities used by the wielder. It also grants a +4 morale bonus on saving throws against mind-affecting and compulsion effects.

name: GuardianOfLifeItem
description: As long as the wearer of this amulet is under the effect of the Death Ward spell, they get a +2 morale bonus to AC against the attacks of undead creatures. If they use any single-target Cure Wounds spell on a target whose current number of HP is 0 or less, the target is healed for an additional number of HP equal to their number of Hit Dice.

name: GyronnasAmuletItem
description: This amulet grants its wearer a +5 insight bonus to AC and gives the benefits of the mirror image spell.

enchant.name: GyronnasAmuletEnchant
effect: Add stat bonus 5 to AC (descriptor: Insight)

name: HalfOfPairedPendantItem
description: Whenever two creatures wearing different halves of this pendant are within a 10 feet distance to each other, each gets a +2 circumstance bonus on attack rolls and a +2 circumstance bonus to AC.

name: HeartOfIraItem
description: The wearer of the necklace becomes immune to fatigue and exhaustion, and can activate the necklace to surround himself with an aura of nothingness. While the aura is activated, creatures adjacent to the wearer take 2d6 damage per round and must succeed on a DC 17 Reflex saving throw to avoid becoming fatigued.

name: LocketOfMagicMissileMasteryItem
description: When the wearer of this locket casts magic missile or force missile spell, it becomes quickened and empowered, as though using the Quicken Spell and Empower Spell feats.

name: LocketOfPerfectCantripsItem
description: This locket makes all 0 level arcane spells cast by the wearer become Empowered, Extended, Reach and Maximized.

name: MayasCharmItem
description: All the wearer's spells from Enchantment and Illusion schools have their DCs increased by 2, but the wearer takes a -2 penalty to Strength. Only characters with a good alignment can wear Maya's Charm.

name: MenanceOfDeathAmuletItem
description: Whenever someone dies within a 10 feet radius from the wearer of this amulet of natural armor +3, the wearer gets the effect of the haste spell for 2d3 rounds. This effect is renewed each time someone dies. After this effect wears off, the wearer cannot make any weapon or unarmed attacks for 1d3 rounds.

name: MesmerizingNecklaceItem
description: This amulet increases by 1 the DC of all Enchantment school spells cast by the wearer. It also grants the ability to cast color spray (DC 13) spell three times a day as a 1st level wizard.

name: NegatorAmuletItem
description: This amulet grants its wearer immunity to cold and fire. It also grants a +6 deflection bonus to AC.

enchant.name: Deflection6
effect: Add stat bonus 6 to AC (descriptor: Deflection)

name: OldEarthAmulet_IntermediateItem
description: This is an intermediate step of relic creation.

name: OldEarthSandAmuletItem
description: Whenever you cast a grease spell, all creatures within the affected area must pass a Reflex saving throw or suffer 1d6 per 2 caster levels acid damage.

name: OldEarthShriekAmuletItem
description: Whenever you cast an ear piercing scream spell, the damage it deals is no longer limited to 5d6. Instead it deals 1d6 + 1 per two caster levels points of damage. Creatures who fail the saving throw against it becomes Dazed for 2 rounds instead of 1 round. The amulet also increases the DC of all spells with sonic descriptor you cast by 2.

name: RecklessVengeanceItem
description: The wearer of this amulet suffers a -4 penalty to AC. Whenever an ally in a 30 feet radius is knocked unconscious or dead, they get two extra attacks per round for two rounds.

name: RiverFoxPendantItem
description: The wearer of River Fox's Memento Pendant gains a +5 competence bonus on all Mobility and Trickery checks and deals an additional 1d6 damage to all flanked opponents, denying their opponents' Dexterity bonus as per Sneak Attack. This damage is increased by an additional 3d6 against targets that aren't in combat.

name: RiversongAmuletItem
description: This amulet grants its wearer a +5 competence bonus to all Persuasion and Athletics skill checks, and resist electricity 20.

enchant.name: RiversongAmuletEnchantment
effect: Add stat bonus 5 to SkillAthletics (descriptor: Competence)
Add stat bonus 5 to SkillPersuasion (descriptor: Competence)

name: SecretsOfSuramgaminNecklaceItem
description: This necklace grants its wearer a +2 bonus to AC. It grants an additional +2 bonus to AC and all saving throws against all evil creatures' attacks. Each time the wearer hits a good-aligned creature, the wearer gets a negative level. Unequipping this amulet is only possible after casting remove curse on the wearer and passing a DC 25 caster level check.

name: StormAmberNecklaceItem
description: When the wearer of this amulet casts a spell with electricity descriptor, it adds +1 to their caster level for the purpose of calculating all level-variable effects of the spell. All spells with electricity descriptor cast by the wearer have their DCs increased by 1.

name: WardMastersAmuletItem
description:
This amulet makes all ward abilities and spells (those which have the word "ward" in their names) grant +1 additional AC, and become extended as though using the Extend Spell feat.
Extend Spell

name: XavornsCrossItem
description: This unholy relic is fashioned entirely of bone and tied together with rope and skin. While in possession of this item, the DC to saving throws against this user's Channel Negative Energy increases by 2 and they may channel energy one additional time per day. Additionally, the user of this symbol may cast create undead once per day for 13 rounds.
